short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download the source .crx file of any Chrome extension with enhanced functionality.
short.zh_CN: 轻松下载任何 Chrome 扩展程序的源 .crx 文件，功能更强大。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Obtain the Original .crx File of Any Chrome Extension

Now fully compatible with both the classic and updated Chrome Web Stores

Our tool provides an efficient and user-friendly solution to instantly access the .crx source file of any free Chrome extension. With a simple right-click in your context menu, you can download the original .crx file directly from the Chrome Web Store, eliminating the need for complicated procedures. Whether you're a developer, researcher, or an advanced user looking to back up your Chrome extensions, this extension serves as the ideal solution for all your needs.

Seamless Compatibility: Works perfectly with both old and new versions of the Chrome Web Store, ensuring consistent functionality.
User-Friendly Operation: Quickly access the .crx file with just a right-click, requiring no technical expertise.
Instant Access: Obtain the source file in seconds, saving you valuable time and effort.
Download now to experience the convenience of this powerful tool and simplify your Chrome extension management like never before!
————————————————————
轻松获取任意Chrome扩展程序的原始 .crx 文件

全面支持旧版和新版Chrome Web Store

我们提供了一款高效、便捷的工具，帮助您快速获取任意免费Chrome扩展程序的 .crx 源文件。只需在扩展页面右键点击，即可直接从上下文菜单中下载原始 .crx 文件，无需繁琐的步骤。无论您是开发者、研究人员，还是需要备份Chrome扩展程序的高级用户，这款插件都将成为您的得力助手，轻松应对各种需求。

兼容性强：完美适用于旧版和新版的Chrome Web Store，让您无后顾之忧。
操作简便：右键点击即可快速获取，无需任何技术门槛。
实时下载：瞬间获取所需扩展程序的源文件，节省时间和精力。
立即下载，体验这款强大工具带来的便利，让Chrome扩展管理变得前所未有的简单！
